meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a leech in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The leechlike creature attached itself to the skin of the swimmer.
meanings.sent2: Her leechlike persistence in asking for more candy annoyed her parents.
meanings.sent3: The leechlike salesman wouldn't stop following me around the store.
meanings.sent4: His leechlike grip on the company's finances drained it of all resources.
meanings.sent5: The leechlike vines wrapped around the tree, slowly draining its life.

meanings.definition: Acting in a parasitic or bloodsucking manner.
meanings.sent1: The leechlike behavior of the greedy corporation harmed small businesses.
meanings.sent2: The mosquito's leechlike feeding left it bloated with blood.
meanings.sent3: The leechlike friend always seemed to show up when I had food.
meanings.sent4: Her leechlike tendencies in relationships drove people away.
meanings.sent5: The leechlike organization sucked the community dry of resources.
